REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f9011 reute d f BC-THERMO-ELECTRON-<TMO> 03-18 0055

TEXT.TITLE: THERMO ELECTRON <TMO> UNIT GETS TURBINE ORDERS
TEXT.BODY: Thermo Electron Corp said its British subsidiary, Peter Brotherhood Ltd, received five mln dlrs in order for steam turbine and turbine generator systems during the first quarter of fiscal 1987. It said Peter Brotherhood's current backlog is 20 mln dlrs. Reuter
